name: Knights of the Dungeon
description:
Welcome to the dungeon!

This game contains two game mode: story and two player pvp. The game was made for the OpenGameArt Spring 2020 Game Jam.  I hpe you enjoy it! If you found a bug or something is weird in the game please let me know in the comments of the game.

1 Player Controls:

  • Move: A/W/S/D
  • Attack: E
  • Heal (with health potion): Q
  • Stats: tab
  • Menu: esc

2 Player Controls:

  • Move:  P1: A/W/S/D       P2: Arrows
  • Attack: P1: E          P2: End

Credits:

  1.   Boxy Bold Split:                                                         https://opengameart.org/content/boxy-bold-font-split

  3. 16x16 Small and Medium Coin Animation:   https://opengameart.org/content/16x16-small-and-medium-coin-animation
  4. 16x16 RPG items:                                                   https://opengameart.org/content/16x16-rpg-items
  5. The Field of the Floating Islands:                         https://opengameart.org/content/the-field-of-the-floating-islands
  6. Pixel Art Dungeon Items:                                      https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-art-dungeon-items
  7. 2d Pixel - Slime enemy - platformer enemy:   https://opengameart.org/content/2d-pixel-slime-enemy-platformer-enemy
  8. heart pixel art:                                                            https://opengameart.org/content/heart-pixel-art
